DOC.brief_summary: Following previous positive experience with CITA-RNPT of infected pacemakers, we suggest that CITA-RNPT can be administered prophylactically to patients prior to replacement of CIED, immun-compromised patients, and others.
DOC.brief_title: Prophylactic Treatment of High-Risk Patients With Cardiovascular Implantable Electronic Devices (CIED)With Continuous In-Situ Ultra High-Dose Antibiotics (CITA) Under Regulated Negative Pressure-Assisted Wound Therapy (RNPT)
DOC.criteria: Highrisk patients for CIED infections All others
